overview: Du-yeol feels that his life ended after being diagnosed HIV/AIDS positive ten years before. Gabriel falls in love for the first time ten years after his diagnosis. The two start living together in a rooftop house, but eventually, Du-yeol leaves, marking the beginning of an endless chain of breakups and getting back together. Although they share similar pains, love seems difficult for them as they have different desires.
title: Summer Days in Bloom
